verses.verse: וְאַחַ֗ר <S%H310><s%> And afterward בָּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> went in מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> and told אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שַׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> Let my people וְיָחֹ֥גּוּ <S%H2287><s%> that they may hold a feast לִ֖י בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> unto me in the wilderness

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Who [is] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> i אֶשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> that I should obey בְּקֹל֔וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice לְשַׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> to let Israel לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H3045><s%> ? I know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> not the LORD וְגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> and besides אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> neither will I let Israel לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֲשַׁלֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H7971><s%> go

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> The God הָעִבְרִ֖ים <S%H5680><s%> of the Hebrews נִקְרָ֣א <S%H7122><s%> hath met עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and נֵ֣לֲכָה <S%H1980><s%> go נָּ֡א <S%H4994><s%> Please דֶּרֶךְ֩ <S%H1870><s%> journey שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> we pray thee three יָמִ֜ים <S%H3117><s%> days' בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> into the desert וְנִזְבְּחָה֙ <S%H2076><s%> and sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God פֶּ֨ן־ <S%H6435><s%> otherwise יִפְגָּעֵ֔נוּ <S%H6293><s%> lest he fall בַּדֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1698><s%> upon us with pestilence א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בֶחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> or with the sword

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> But מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לָ֚מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> unto them Wherefore do ye Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron תַּפְרִ֥יעוּ <S%H6544><s%> let אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people מִמַּֽעֲשָׂ֑יו <S%H4639><s%> act לְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> to לְסִבְלֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5450><s%> you unto your burdens

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh הֵן־ <S%H2005><s%> Look רַבִּ֥ים <S%H7227><s%> now [are] many עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> are now עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> Behold the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְהִשְׁבַּתֶּ֥ם <S%H7673><s%> and ye make them rest אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִסִּבְלֹתָֽם׃ <S%H5450><s%> from their burdens

וַיְצַ֥ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the same day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> the same אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֹּגְשִׂ֣ים <S%H5065><s%> the taskmasters בָּעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֹׁטְרָ֖יו <S%H7860><s%> and their officers לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are no תֹאסִפ֞וּן <S%H3254><s%> Ye shall no more לָתֵ֨ת <S%H5414><s%> give תֶּ֧בֶן <S%H8401><s%> straw לָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> the people לִלְבֹּ֥ן <S%H3835><s%> to make הַלְּבֵנִ֖ים <S%H3843><s%> brick כִּתְמ֣וֹל <S%H8543><s%> before שִׁלְשֹׁ֑ם <S%H8032><s%> before that time הֵ֚ם <S%H1992><s%> themselves יֵֽלְכ֔וּ <S%H1980><s%> go וְקֹשְׁשׁ֥וּ <S%H7197><s%> and gather לָהֶ֖ם תֶּֽבֶן׃ <S%H8401><s%> straw

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַתְכֹּ֨נֶת <S%H4971><s%> And the tale הַלְּבֵנִ֜ים <S%H3843><s%> of the bricks אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הֵם֩ <S%H1992><s%> they עֹשִׂ֨ים <S%H6213><s%> which they did make תְּמ֤וֹל <S%H8543><s%> before שִׁלְשֹׁם֙ <S%H8032><s%> before that time תָּשִׂ֣ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> ye shall lay עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> are not תִגְרְע֖וּ <S%H1639><s%> upon them ye shall not diminish מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> any כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because נִרְפִּ֣ים <S%H7503><s%> [ought] thereof for they [be] idle הֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that הֵ֤ם <S%H1992><s%> they צֹֽעֲקִים֙ <S%H6817><s%> therefore they cry לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying נֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> go נִזְבְּחָ֥ה <S%H2076><s%> [and] sacrifice לֵאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> to our God

תִּכְבַּ֧ד <S%H3513><s%> be laid הָעֲבֹדָ֛ה <S%H5656><s%> Let there more work עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> the men וְיַעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> that they may labour בָ֑הּ וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> no יִשְׁע֖וּ <S%H8159><s%> therein and let them not regard בְּדִבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> words שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> vain

וַיֵּ֨צְא֜וּ <S%H3318><s%> went out נֹגְשֵׂ֤י <S%H5065><s%> And the taskmasters הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְשֹׁ֣טְרָ֔יו <S%H7860><s%> and their officers וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> and they spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> to the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh אֵינֶ֛נִּי <S%H369><s%> I am not נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> I will not give לָכֶ֖ם תֶּֽבֶן׃ <S%H8401><s%> you straw

אַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> You לְכ֨וּ <S%H1980><s%> go קְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> ye get לָכֶם֙ תֶּ֔בֶן <S%H8401><s%> you straw מֵאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> where תִּמְצָ֑אוּ <S%H4672><s%> ye can find כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> it yet אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> none נִגְרָ֛ע <S%H1639><s%> shall be diminished מֵעֲבֹדַתְכֶ֖ם <S%H5656><s%> of your work דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> not ought

וַיָּ֥פֶץ <S%H6327><s%> were scattered abroad הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> So the people בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> throughout all the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לְקֹשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H7197><s%> to gather קַ֖שׁ <S%H7179><s%> stubble לַתֶּֽבֶן׃ <S%H8401><s%> instead of straw

וְהַנֹּגְשִׂ֖ים <S%H5065><s%> And the taskmasters אָצִ֣ים <S%H213><s%> hasted לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> [them] saying כַּלּ֤וּ <S%H3615><s%> Fulfil מַעֲשֵׂיכֶם֙ <S%H4639><s%> your works דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> tasks י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [your] daily בְּיוֹמ֔וֹ <S%H3117><s%> daily כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> you בִּהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> as when there was הַתֶּֽבֶן׃ <S%H8401><s%> straw

וַיֻּכּ֗וּ <S%H5221><s%> over them were beaten שֹֽׁטְרֵי֙ <S%H7860><s%> And the officers בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom שָׂ֣מוּ <S%H7760><s%> had set עֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> over נֹגְשֵׂ֥י <S%H5065><s%> taskmasters פַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> which Pharaoh's לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> [and] demanded מַדּ֡וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why לֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> not כִלִּיתֶ֨ם <S%H3615><s%> Wherefore have ye not fulfilled חָקְכֶ֤ם <S%H2706><s%> your task לִלְבֹּן֙ <S%H3835><s%> in making brick כִּתְמ֣וֹל <S%H8543><s%> both yesterday שִׁלְשֹׁ֔ם <S%H8032><s%> before that time גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> either תְּמ֖וֹל <S%H8543><s%> yesterday גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> or הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> and to day

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> came שֹֽׁטְרֵי֙ <S%H7860><s%> Then the officers בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּצְעֲק֥וּ <S%H6817><s%> and cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying לָ֧מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תַעֲשֶׂ֦ה <S%H6213><s%> Wherefore dealest כֹ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> this לַעֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> bondage

תֶּ֗בֶן <S%H8401><s%> There is no straw אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> There נִתָּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> given לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servants וּלְבֵנִ֛ים <S%H3843><s%> brick אֹמְרִ֥ים <S%H559><s%> and they say לָ֖נוּ עֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> to us Make וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> behold עֲבָדֶ֛יךָ <S%H5650><s%> and behold thy servants מֻכִּ֖ים <S%H5221><s%> [are] beaten וְחָטָ֥את <S%H2398><s%> but the fault עַמֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> [is] in thine own people

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> But he said נִרְפִּ֥ים <S%H7503><s%> Ye [are] idle אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you נִרְפִּ֑ים <S%H7503><s%> [ye are] idle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> therefore ye say נֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> go נִזְבְּחָ֥ה <S%H2076><s%> [and] do sacrifice לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> go עִבְד֔וּ <S%H5647><s%> therefore now [and] work וְתֶ֖בֶן <S%H8401><s%> for there shall no straw לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִנָּתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> be given לָכֶ֑ם וְתֹ֥כֶן <S%H8506><s%> the tale לְבֵנִ֖ים <S%H3843><s%> of bricks תִּתֵּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H5414><s%> you yet shall ye deliver

וַיִּרְא֞וּ <S%H7200><s%> did see שֹֽׁטְרֵ֧י <S%H7860><s%> And the officers בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּרָ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> [that] they [were] in evil לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> [case] after it was said לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> must not תִגְרְע֥וּ <S%H1639><s%> Ye shall not minish מִלִּבְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H3843><s%> [ought] from your bricks דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> task י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> daily בְּיוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H3117><s%> daily

וַֽיִּפְגְּעוּ֙ <S%H6293><s%> And they met אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron נִצָּבִ֖ים <S%H5324><s%> who stood לִקְרָאתָ֑ם <S%H7125><s%> in the way בְּצֵאתָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> as they came forth מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> from Pharaoh

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about יֵ֧רֶא <S%H7200><s%> look יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> unto them The LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> upon וְיִשְׁפֹּ֑ט <S%H8199><s%> upon you and judge אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> to be הִבְאַשְׁתֶּ֣ם <S%H887><s%> to be abhorred אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵיחֵ֗נוּ <S%H7381><s%> because ye have made our savour בְּעֵינֵ֤י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes פַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh וּבְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> and in the eyes עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> of his servants לָֽתֶת־ <S%H5414><s%> to put חֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> a sword בְּיָדָ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> in their hand לְהָרְגֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H2026><s%> to slay

וַיָּ֧שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> Lord לָמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> why הֲרֵעֹ֙תָה֙ <S%H7489><s%> wherefore hast thou [so] evil entreated לָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> folk הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> to this לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why זֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> ever שְׁלַחְתָּֽנִי׃ <S%H7971><s%> send

וּמֵאָ֞ז <S%H227><s%> for בָּ֤אתִי <S%H935><s%> For since I came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> to Pharaoh לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> to speak בִּשְׁמֶ֔ךָ <S%H8034><s%> in thy name הֵרַ֖ע <S%H7489><s%> he hath done evil לָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> to this people הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וְהַצֵּ֥ל <S%H5337><s%> neither hast thou delivered לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> at הִצַּ֖לְתָּ <S%H5337><s%> at all אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> thy people
